name: HIGGS BOSON DISCOVERY #3 - ATLAS
description:
A series created to mark the discovery of the Higgs-Boson particle by extracting the images associated with the discovery and abstracting them into 3D objects via geometry displacement.

This image is a representation of the ATLAS detector in the Large Hadron Collider at CERN. In 2012, it was jointly credited with detecting the first signs of the Higgs boson particle.
